group_1.textLeft: Feels like some kinda plot flag just got set…

group_1.textRight: I mean, if we just saw Kyubey, there's a pretty@good chance Olga just saw him, too.

group_1.textLeft: Perhaps.

group_1.textRight: …Yeah, I guess so, huh?

group_1.textLeft: Here we are…
So is Iroha's concept somewhere@in this village?

group_1.textRight: According to the history penned in the book...
We are in the village of Ithvollr.

group_1.textLeft: Wait, wasn't this place called "Isvik?"

group_1.textRight: There is a discrepancy in the name,@but I'm certain this is the right place.

group_1.textLeft: Are you absolutely sure…?

group_1.textRight: I already know everything in the book.@It's just…
There are some places where the description@is ambiguous.
It may be that Big Sister collapsed before@she could finish refining the book.

group_1.textLeft: So it's like a bug or something?@Can't you analyze it more?

group_1.textRight: I am unable to do so as an Uwasa dwelling@within this book.
Still, we have almost all of the information that@we need. This is how we'll gather the rest.
Let's carry on as we were.

group_1.textLeft: Hey, c'mon…
But we have barely anything to work with@for our investigation…

group_1.textRight: Yeah, that's right…@But to review what we do have…
First off, we know there're two sisters@livin' here…
Their names are Olga 'n Gunhild.
Accordin' to the book, "a lone Magical Girl is@born and battles a Witch."
…'cept we don't even know which one'll@become a Magical Girl…

group_1.textLeft: It's like bookworms have eaten up@a bunch of pages...

group_1.textRight: Even so…
Our primary objective is unquestionable.@We must follow the two sisters.

group_1.textLeft: …Well, that's true.
One of them must have been the Magical Girl@that Tamaki was tracking.
Alright, ain't no point in wastin' time.@Let's go see 'em.

group_1.textRight: I must warn you, however…

group_1.textLeft: …What's that?

group_1.textRight: Don't meddle too deeply with historical events.

group_1.textLeft: …Yeah, you already told us that before@we came here!

group_1.textRight: I just wanted to reiterate to be sure.

group_1.textLeft: Well then, in that same vein, I must ask you something...
While we don't perceive it ourselves, we blend@into this setting perfectly, correct?

group_1.textRight: Yes. As far as others are concerned, neither@our appearances nor language are unusual.
That's weird…@I don't feel any different.

group_1.textLeft: In that case, we'll continue on as we planned…
I got this one, and that one, and this…@and that…

group_1.textRight: And this as well.

group_1.textLeft: Hey, thanks!
…Hm? Who are those people?@Never seen 'em around before…

group_1.textRight: I heard they're traveling merchants looking@for goods to sell.

group_1.textLeft: Huh! You think they'd be willing to tell us@about their travels?

group_1.textRight: I don't know if we should―

group_1.textLeft: Hey! 'Scuse me!

group_1.textRight: …She dove right in.
Hey, hey, hey!

group_1.textLeft: What is it?

group_1.textRight: Are you guys travelin' merchants?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah!

group_1.textRight: I'd love to hear about your travels!

group_1.textLeft: Travels…?
…Uh, well, we're from a place called@Kamihama…
Hey! Careful!

group_1.textRight: Kami…hama?

group_1.textLeft: You didn't hear nothin'!
Ah…I know! Why don't we talk about@how things are in England…?

group_1.textRight: Sounds good to me!@So c'mon! Please tell me!

group_1.textLeft: Ah, erm…
…What's wrong?

group_1.textRight: …Nothin' big… I was…just wonderin' if she's@the one who becomes a Magical Girl…

group_1.textLeft: She did see Kyubey back there.
He got interrupted, but I'm sure he's going@after her.

group_1.textRight: …Yeah, I suppose.

group_1.textLeft: …Hey, you're not getting all choked up now,@are ya?

group_1.textRight: …She was so nice 'n cheerful when we were@talkin' with her… I just…
Don't get too invested.
Our purpose here is to―

group_1.textLeft: I know!
It'll be fine!@I'll get this done right!

group_1.textRight: We're counting on you.

group_1.narration: And then…sometime after we first met@Yuna and her buddies…
